name: BlueVGA
keywords: VGA, game, engine, gamepad, controller, joystick, graphics, font, arduino, bluepill, driver, display, corbera, stm32f103, pixel, tiles
description: VGA dirver based on tiles (characters) for the STM32F103C (bluepill). The engine supports 8 colors and 224x240 pixels organized in 28x30 tiles.
